page.title: 13Evening duties for a girl.
page.content: On my way home from school,I pass the Horse and Jockey which is the public house that owns the land on which I graze my donkey.I take Murfi, the donkey, down to my house and put her in the stable after bedding her down and feeding her, then I go and have my tea. After tea I change and feed the hens. I then collect the eggs;we usually get two to four eggs a day.When I have fed the hens I feed the ferrets.I have two ferrets called Snowball and Sweetpea. Sweetpea has had three young ferrets.She would have had more but she is only a small ferret.After that I feed the cat then I take our dogs a walk.When I have taken the dogs, Rachel and I go riding on Murfi.Some times I help my brother Simon feed his pigeons but not very often.
